ingredients.item: 1 large red chilli, seeded and finely chopped
½ x 25g pack fresh basil, leaves roughly torn

instructions.step: Cook the tagliatelle in a large pan of boiling salted water for 6 minutes, then add the kale and cook for a further 3 minutes.
Meanwhile, heat the oil in a small pan and add the chilli and garlic. Cook gently for 2 minutes, then add the salad onions and cook for
Drain the tagliatelle and kale and return to the pan. Stir in the garlic mixture and most of the basil. Gently fold through the ricotta.
Divide between 4 shallow bowls then scatter over the pinenuts, remaining basil and a good grinding of coarse black pepper.
